dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Swim in shoals at the lower water layers of rivers and inshore areas of lake.  Feeds on worms, crustaceans, insects and plant matter (Ref. 7020).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Morphology
dataObjects.description: Dorsal spines (total): 0; Dorsal soft rays (total): 24 - 25;  Analspines: 0; Analsoft rays: 14 - 15

dataObjects.title: Max. size

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: pelagic; freshwater; pH range: 6.0 - 7.5; dH range: 10 - 20

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#MolecularBiology
dataObjects.title: Barcode data: Distichodus sexfasciatus
dataObjects.description:
The following is a representative barcode sequence, the centroid of all available sequences for this species.


There are 7 barcode sequences available from BOLD and GenBank.

Below is a sequence of the barcode region Cytochrome oxidase subunit 1 (COI or COX1) from a member of the species.

See the BOLD taxonomy browser for more complete information about this specimen and other sequences.


-- end --
